article.title: Couchbase Lite Listener
article.description: This guide shows you how to active the Lite Listener, which provides the REST abstraction used, among other things, for peer to peer sync.

introduction.paragraph: The Lite Listener is an optional component that enables the REST API and peer to peer sync. Access to this API can be restricted to the local application, in the case of hybrid native/web apps. Or it can be opened to other instances of the application, and even advertized on the network.
Some typical Listener configurations and use cases.

unordered-list.list-item: This app only -- PhoneGap and hybrid apps
Trusted peers only -- Sync based on QR code secret, etc.
This app / security group only -- Use application controls over peering
Wide open -- Experimental social messaging apps
Offline/online -- Use peer to peer in conjunction with cloud sync

body.paragraph: The details depend on your platform.
